title: Sterlite Power secures Rs 1,373 crore funding for Neemrana II Kotputli transmission project
description: Sterlite Power announced the successful funding of Rs 1,373 crore for its Neemrana II Kotputli Transmission Limited project from Power Finance Corporation. Sterlite Power aims to build a green energy corridor. Acquired in November 2023, the project will operate on a BOOT basis for 35 years. This initiative will interconnect the Neemrana and Kotputli substations and facilitate a LILO to integrate the Neemrana II substation with Gurugram and Sohna substations.
